item.description:
Update: Moved to May 16th to accomodate members schedule. It's a new chance for folks to join in.

Discuss Role-Playing Games Design and Theory, talk about specific homebrews in the works by our members. Probably only of interest to a few, at least judging by the last time we had an event like this last fall.

I'm trying to decide if it makes sense to split this type of activity into a different meetup group.
A temporary one has been setup as the Game Designer's Guild, where this event is posted as well.
http://www.meetup.com...

If you want to weigh in if it make sense please voice your opinion in the follow poll:
http://meetup.rpfgb.o...

Christian
item.name: Game Designers Guild Spring Meetup
